item.title: Villaging With the Himalayan
item.description: I like to ride for pleasure at least once a week, but have been getting a bit bored with riding the same roads and lanes. I’m fortunate to have some beautiful countryside nearby (Dartmoor – I’m in England) but even so, it’s a bit repetitive eventually. My solution to this ‘problem’ is to set myself a target – to take my Himalayan to every Village in my home county of Devon.
